title: Banana Bread
directions: Butter a loaf pan or line with parchment paper.
In measuring cup, whisk milk with lemon juice; set aside.
In a bowl, combine all-purpose and whole wheat flours, baking powder, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
In large bowl, using electric mixer, beat butter and sugar until light. Beat in egg and vanilla extract until blended. Beat in bananas.
With a wooden spoon, stir in flour mixture alternately with milk mixture, making 3 additions of flour and 2 of milk, just until combined.
Bake for 60 to 70 min. Let cool in pan on rack for 5 min.
